mapper.insert: insert into pb_storage_bill (id, create_time, create_man, code, user_id, product_quantity, status, type, audit_man, audit_time, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pb_storage_bill set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, product_quantity = #{productQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit_man = #{auditMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, create_man, code, user_id, product_quantity, status, type, audit_man, audit_time, remark from pb_storage_bill where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
